graph.original_query: Mahindra has launched a new vehicle called xuv 3xo, fetch details on the features for this vehicle, use a single step for Retriever Agent but use multiple iterations in a single step (call_Self=true) to compile the data and then create a report

The Diesel engine is 1498 cc while the Petrol engine is 1197 cc . It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the XUV 3XO has a mileage of 17.96 to 20.6 kmpl. The XUV 3XO is a 5 seater 3 cylinder car and has length of 3990 mm, width of 1821 mm and a wheelbase of 2600. Images Colours Videos Fuel Cost FAQs EMI More + 50 more Previous slide Next slide Mahindra XUV 3XO specifications Autocar score 8 View full review 9.06 - 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO standout features Mahindra XUV 3XO is the widest in its segment, measuring 1821 mm has the longest wheelbase at 2600 mm, and stands 1647 mm tall. It has a ground clearance of 201 mm. It gets two petrol and one diesel option. The 1.2 litre MPFI petrol engine produces 110 Hp and 200 Nm while the fancier TGDI produces 130 Hp and 230 Nm. The diesel mill comes with a 1.5 litre turbo and produces 115 Hp and 300 Nm. The automatic diesel is only offered with an AMT transmission. Sunroof Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. Fuel Type Petrol, Diesel Engine Displacement 1197 cc - 1497 cc Body Style SUV Seats 5 Transmission Type TC, Manual, AMT Mileage 17.96kpl - 21.2kpl Mahindra XUV 3XO specifications Variant Select variant Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out with its refined and robust exterior design. T002.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to create a comprehensive HTML report detailing the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, based on the data provided in `T001`. I will focus on engine specs, safety, interior, technology, and unique selling points. I'll extract information from the `all_globals_schema`, prioritizing the content from `T001`, and ensure the report has the structure and depth of a McKinsey-grade document. I will also include images and cite sources appropriately. Given the potential for a large report and the instructions to use `call_self=true` at least once, I will set it to true for the first pass to ensure thoroughness, targeting 8-12 sections initially.  I will look for 4-5 images to add to the report.

output.fallback_markdown:
# Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Report

## Executive Summary

Details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, including engine specifications, safety features, interior design, and technology.
output.reasoning: Extracted XUV 3XO features from the provided data. Created an HTML report structure with sections for executive summary, engine specifications, safety features, interior design, technology, and unique selling points. Included images where available. Set `call_self` to true for further refinement and expansion of the report.
output.formatted_report_T002:
üìä Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Report

üéØ Executive Summary

This report provides a detailed overview of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, a compact SUV known for its powerful engine options, advanced safety features, and stylish design. The report covers key aspects such as engine specifications, safety technologies, interior and exterior design elements, and unique selling points that position the XUV 3XO competitively in the market.

‚öôÔ∏è Engine Specifications

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers multiple engine options:

  • 1.2-litre Turbo Petrol (MPFI): Produces 110 Hp and 200 Nm of torque.
  • 1.2-litre Turbo Petrol (TGDi): Delivers 130 Hp and 230 Nm of torque. This engine is the most powerful in its class.
  • 1.5-litre Diesel: Generates 115 Hp and 300 Nm of torque.

The transmission options include manual, AMT, and a 6-speed torque converter. The mileage ranges from 17.96 kmpl to 21.2 kmpl depending on the engine and transmission type [1].

üõ°Ô∏è Safety Features

The XUV 3XO is equipped with Level 2 ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistance Systems), which includes features such as forward collision warning and adaptive cruise control. It also boasts a 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating. Standard safety features include:

  • Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
  • Driver Airbag
  • Passenger Airbag

üõãÔ∏è Interior Design

The interior of the XUV 3XO features soft-touch materials on the dashboard and door pads, enhancing the premium feel. Key interior features include:

  • Panoramic sunroof (largest in the segment)
  • Automatic climate control
  • Multi-function steering wheel
  • Ventilated seats

üíª Technology

The XUV 3XO is loaded with technology, including a 10.25-inch touchscreen infotainment system and over 60 connected car features. Additional tech features include:

  • Real-time vehicle tracking
  • Cruise control
  • Parking sensors (front and rear)

üåü Unique Selling Points

The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out due to several unique selling points:

  • Powerful Engine: The 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine (TGDi) is the most powerful in its class, delivering 130PS/230Nm.
  • Panoramic Sunroof: The largest sunroof in the segment provides an open and airy feel to the cabin.
  • ADAS Level 2: Advanced safety features enhance driver assistance and safety.
  • Spacious Boot: Offers a boot space of 364 litres [1].
  • Connected Car Features: Over 60 connected car features provide enhanced convenience and control.

üìè Dimensions and Capacity

The XUV 3XO has the following dimensions:

  • Length: 3990 mm
  • Width: 1821 mm
  • Height: 1647 mm
  • Wheelbase: 2600 mm
  • Boot Space: 364 Litres
  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 42 Litres

üìú Source Citations

  1. Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications - CarDekho

nodes.description: Fetch details on the features of the new Mahindra XUV 3XO vehicle using multiple iterations.
nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch details on the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO vehicle. Use multiple search iterations to compile a comprehensive list of features. During each iteration, refine search terms to cover all aspects, including engine specifications, safety features, interior design, technology, and any unique selling points. Aggregate the information into a structured summary. Return 'COMPLETE' in the output when all iterations are done and all info is compiled. Else return 'CONTINUE'.

Images Colours Videos Fuel Cost FAQs EMI More + 50 more Previous slide Next slide Mahindra XUV 3XO specifications Autocar score 8 View full review 9.06 - 18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO standout features Mahindra XUV 3XO is the widest in its segment, measuring 1821 mm has the longest wheelbase at 2600 mm, and stands 1647 mm tall. It has a ground clearance of 201 mm. It gets two petrol and one diesel option. The 1.2 litre MPFI petrol engine produces 110 Hp and 200 Nm while the fancier TGDI produces 130 Hp and 230 Nm. The diesel mill comes with a 1.5 litre turbo and produces 115 Hp and 300 Nm. The automatic diesel is only offered with an AMT transmission. Sunroof Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV. nodes.description: Create a report detailing the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO vehicle.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a detailed report outlining the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO vehicle based on the information provided. Structure the report to include sections on engine specifications, safety features, interior design, technology, and unique selling points. Format the report in a well-structured and visually organized way, suitable for executive-level presentation. Prefer HTML.

output.initial_thoughts: Okay, I need to create a comprehensive HTML report detailing the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, based on the data provided in `T001`. I will focus on engine specs, safety, interior, technology, and unique selling points. I'll extract information from the `all_globals_schema`, prioritizing the content from `T001`, and ensure the report has the structure and depth of a McKinsey-grade document. I will also include images and cite sources appropriately. Given the potential for a large report and the instructions to use `call_self=true` at least once, I will set it to true for the first pass to ensure thoroughness, targeting 8-12 sections initially.  I will look for 4-5 images to add to the report.

output.fallback_markdown:
# Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Report

## Executive Summary

Details of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, including engine specifications, safety features, interior design, and technology.
output.reasoning: Extracted XUV 3XO features from the provided data. Created an HTML report structure with sections for executive summary, engine specifications, safety features, interior design, technology, and unique selling points. Included images where available. Set `call_self` to true for further refinement and expansion of the report.
output.formatted_report_T002:
üìä Mahindra XUV 3XO Features Report

üéØ Executive Summary

This report provides a detailed overview of the Mahindra XUV 3XO, a compact SUV known for its powerful engine options, advanced safety features, and stylish design. The report covers key aspects such as engine specifications, safety technologies, interior and exterior design elements, and unique selling points that position the XUV 3XO competitively in the market.

‚öôÔ∏è Engine Specifications

The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers multiple engine options:

  • 1.2-litre Turbo Petrol (MPFI): Produces 110 Hp and 200 Nm of torque.
  • 1.2-litre Turbo Petrol (TGDi): Delivers 130 Hp and 230 Nm of torque. This engine is the most powerful in its class.
  • 1.5-litre Diesel: Generates 115 Hp and 300 Nm of torque.

The transmission options include manual, AMT, and a 6-speed torque converter. The mileage ranges from 17.96 kmpl to 21.2 kmpl depending on the engine and transmission type [1].

üõ°Ô∏è Safety Features

The XUV 3XO is equipped with Level 2 ADAS (Advanced Driver Assistance Systems), which includes features such as forward collision warning and adaptive cruise control. It also boasts a 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating. Standard safety features include:

  • Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)
  • Driver Airbag
  • Passenger Airbag

üõãÔ∏è Interior Design

The interior of the XUV 3XO features soft-touch materials on the dashboard and door pads, enhancing the premium feel. Key interior features include:

  • Panoramic sunroof (largest in the segment)
  • Automatic climate control
  • Multi-function steering wheel
  • Ventilated seats

üíª Technology

The XUV 3XO is loaded with technology, including a 10.25-inch touchscreen infotainment system and over 60 connected car features. Additional tech features include:

  • Real-time vehicle tracking
  • Cruise control
  • Parking sensors (front and rear)

üåü Unique Selling Points

The Mahindra XUV 3XO stands out due to several unique selling points:

  • Powerful Engine: The 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine (TGDi) is the most powerful in its class, delivering 130PS/230Nm.
  • Panoramic Sunroof: The largest sunroof in the segment provides an open and airy feel to the cabin.
  • ADAS Level 2: Advanced safety features enhance driver assistance and safety.
  • Spacious Boot: Offers a boot space of 364 litres [1].
  • Connected Car Features: Over 60 connected car features provide enhanced convenience and control.

üìè Dimensions and Capacity

The XUV 3XO has the following dimensions:

  • Length: 3990 mm
  • Width: 1821 mm
  • Height: 1647 mm
  • Wheelbase: 2600 mm
  • Boot Space: 364 Litres
  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 42 Litres

üìú Source Citations

  1. Mahindra XUV 3XO Specifications - CarDekho
